original_text: A man from Ethiopia called Zerah marched out to attack Judah. He had a very big army of a million soldiers and 300 chariots. When he reached Mareshah,
korean_text: 구스 사람 세라가 그들을 치려 하여 군사 백만 명과 병거 삼백 대를 거느리고 마레사에 이르매

sentences.original_text: A man from Ethiopia called Zerah
He had a very big army
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 매우 큰 군대를 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: of a million soldiers and 300 chariots
